sourcesContent:
// src/components/Dashboard.js
import React from 'react';
import { Box, Grid, Paper, Typography, Avatar, IconButton, Divider } from '@mui/material';
import NotificationsIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Notifications';
import ChatBubbleOutlineIcon from '@mui/icons-material/ChatBubbleOutline';
import { styled } from '@mui/material/styles';

const Dashboard = () => {
  return (
    <Box component="main" sx={{ flexGrow: 1, p: 3, backgroundColor: '#2c2c2c', color: '#fff' }}>
      <Grid container spacing={2}>
        <Grid item xs={12}>
          <Box display="flex" justifyContent="space-between" alignItems="center">
            <Typography variant="h4">Hello, [Student Name]!</Typography>
            <Box>
              <IconButton color="primary">
                <NotificationsIcon />
              </IconButton>
              <Avatar alt="Student Profile" src="/static/images/avatar/1.jpg" />
            </Box>
          </Box>
        </Grid>

        {/* Active Programs */}
        <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
          <StyledPaper>
            <Typography variant="h6">Active Programs</Typography>
            <ProgramCard
              programName="Master of Computer Science"
              institution="University of Upstate at Brookstone"
              completion="45%"
              grade="A-"
            />
            <ProgramCard
              programName="Certificate UX/UI Design"
              institution="Academy of Art and Technology at Dursburg"
              completion="28%"
              grade="--"
            />
          </StyledPaper>
        </Grid>

        {/* Upcoming Sessions */}
        <Grid item xs={12} md={6}>
          <StyledPaper>
            <Typography variant="h6">Upcoming Sessions</Typography>
            <SessionCard
              date="Tomorrow"
              time="08:30am - 10:00pm"
              subject="Database and Information Systems"
            />
          </StyledPaper>
        </Grid>

        {/* Messaging */}
        <Grid item xs={12}>
          <StyledPaper>
            <Typography variant="h6">Messaging</Typography>
            <Divider sx={{ my: 1 }} />
            <MessagingSection />
          </StyledPaper>
        </Grid>
      </Grid>
    </Box>
  );
};

// Subcomponents used within Dashboard
const ProgramCard = ({ programName, institution, completion, grade }) => (
  <Box sx={{ p: 2, mb: 2, border: '1px solid #444', borderRadius: '8px' }}>
    <Typography variant="subtitle1">{programName}</Typography>
    <Typography variant="body2" sx={{ color: '#888' }}>
      {institution}
    </Typography>
    <Box display="flex" justifyContent="space-between" alignItems="center">
      <Typography variant="body2">Completion: {completion}</Typography>
      <Typography variant="body2">Grade: {grade}</Typography>
    </Box>
  </Box>
);

const SessionCard = ({ date, time, subject }) => (
  <Box sx={{ p: 2, mb: 2, border: '1px solid #444', borderRadius: '8px' }}>
    <Typography variant="body2">{date}</Typography>
    <Typography variant="subtitle2">{subject}</Typography>
    <Typography variant="body2">{time}</Typography>
  </Box>
);

const MessagingSection = () => (
  <Box display="flex" flexDirection="column" gap={2}>
    <MessageCard name="Sophie Kowalski" message="Thanks, Mia. Please let me know when I can find..." />
    <MessageCard name="Ex Remedy App Group" message="Jarvis: How about I start compiling all feedback..." />
    <MessageCard name="John Kumoz" message="Hey Mia. Do you know where I can find the resources?" />
  </Box>
);

const MessageCard = ({ name, message }) => (
  <Box display="flex" alignItems="center" justifyContent="space-between">
    <Box display="flex" alignItems="center">
      <Avatar sx={{ bgcolor: '#61dafb', marginRight: 2 }}>{name.charAt(0)}</Avatar>
      <Box>
        <Typography variant="subtitle2">{name}</Typography>
        <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">
          {message}
        </Typography>
      </Box>
    </Box>
    <IconButton>
      <ChatBubbleOutlineIcon />
    </IconButton>
  </Box>
);

const StyledPaper = styled(Paper)({
  padding: '20px',
  marginBottom: '20px',
  backgroundColor: '#333',
  color: '#fff',
  borderRadius: '8px',
  boxShadow: '0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)',
});

export default Dashboard;
